title: Job vacancies at U-Connect Human Resource Limited
content:
U-Connect is a Human Resource Consulting Company that specializes in the utilization of methods and platforms to achieve ultimate customer service delivery. Our service offerings include world-class personnel outsourcing, online recruitment, headhunting, training and development, quality management solutions, outplacements, payroll administration as well as Business Process Outsourcing (BPO) services to our valued customers.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Sales Executive

Job Location: Lagos (Remote)
Number Required: 30
Workmode: Remote work

Job Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We're seeking a driven Sales Executive to join our team in Lagos and contribute to our growth.
	As a Sales Executive, you'll be responsible for promoting our cybersecurity solutions to potential clients, building relationships, and driving sales growth.
	You'll work closely with our team to identify new business opportunities, develop sales strategies, and deliver exceptional customer service.


Responsibilities


	Identify and pursue new business opportunities in the cybersecurity market
	Build and maintain strong relationships with clients and prospects
	Develop and implement effective sales strategies to meet or exceed targets
	Conduct product demonstrations and presentations to showcase our solutions
	Collaborate with the sales team to share best practices and stay updated on industry trends
	Provide exceptional customer service and support to ensure client satisfaction and retention.


Requirements


	Minimum of OND (Ordinary National Diploma) in any relevant field
	0 - 2 years of sales experience (cybersecurity or IT sales experience is a plus)
	Proven track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team
	Strong understanding of the Nigerian market and business landscape.


What We Offer


	Competitive basic salary based on experience
	Attractive commission structure to reward high performance
	Flexible and remote work mode
	Comprehensive training and development programs to enhance your skills and knowledge
	Opportunities for professional growth and development in a dynamic industry
	Collaborative and supportive team environment.


Application Closing Date: 19th December, 2025.

Click here to apply online

 

 

2.) Human Resources / Administrative Officer

Job Location: Sapphire Garden, Lekki Epe expressway, Awoyaya - Lagos
Job Type: Full-time

Job Description


	The HR/Admin Officer will be responsible for providing administrative support and handling HR functions to ensure smooth operations within the organization.


Responsibilities


	Manage HR processes including recruitment support, employee records, and on boarding.
	Handle administrative tasks such as correspondence, filing, and office management.
	Support employee relations and welfare activities.
	Coordinate training and development initiatives.
	Assist in payroll and benefits administration.
	Ensure compliance with company policies and relevant labor laws.
	Provide general administrative support to ensure office efficiency.
	-Liaise with various departments on HR and admin matters.


Requirements


	BS.c / HND / OND in any field.
	Proven experience in HR and/or administrative roles.
	Good understanding of HR practices and labor regulations in Nigeria.
	Strong organizational and communication skills.
	Ability to handle confidential information with discretion.
	Proficiency in MS Office suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook).
	Salary- N120,000 per month during probation period (3 months).


Salary


	Upon confirmation: N150,000 per month.


Application Closing Date: 15th December, 2025.

Click here to apply online

 

 

3.) Structural Engineer (SE) - Expatriates & Nationals

Job Location: Nigeria

Responsibilities


	Support and ensure the effective and efficient design of buildings and structures as may be required.
	Assess technical requirements and provide technical advice for project related inputs.
	Work with other project team members (including architects and building (contractors) both onsite and offsite to ensure the effective and efficient implementation of projects.
	Work with statutory planning officials to secure required regulatory approvals for building and related projects.
	Maintain an updated project monitoring log and provide timely communication to critical stakeholders on status and technical evaluation of projects.


Requirements


	Minimum of Bachelor's Degree (Second Class Upper Division) in Civil or Structural Engineering from a reputable university.
	Proven expertise with a minimum of 15 years of relevant experience in the structural design and construction industry.
	A postgraduate certification will be an added advantage.
	Professional certification and accreditation by the Nigerian Society of Engineers is a requirement.
	Proven use of the latest CAD software to design buildings and related models.
	Ability to multitask including coordinating and managing several projects, with solid project management skills.
	Ability to align, inspire and influence outsourced/external partners and teams for results.
	Strong leadership, and organizational management skills.
	Good problem solving, innovation, analytical, presentation and interpersonal skills.


Remuneration
Remunerations for the position is clearly above industry average, and includes payments in US Dollars and Nigerian Naira.

Application Closing Date: 20th November, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume, possibly with a scanned passport photograph to: realestate.managementpros@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be acknowledged.

     

    

        Click here to Apply

Station Manager Job at Matrix Energy Group




        
    

        
        Matrix Energy Group is a rapidly growing indigenous and integrated Oil Marketing and Trading Company in Nigeria, which was incorporated November 25, 2004.

Over the years, Matrix Energy has grown from a modest supply and distributions operation to a fully integrated petroleum products marketing and trading company with clients and suppliers all over the world.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Station Manager

Job Locations: South-South, South-West, North-Central, North-East, and North-West
Job type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The person in this position is responsible for coordinating and continuously improving sales activities at the station, monitoring product discharge, coordinating stock planning and management to ensure regular product availability. 
	In addition, maintaining relationships with statutory agencies, security agents, and coordinating staff’s activities at the outlet are major responsibilities of the employee in this position


Responsibilities


	Responsible for the proper coordination of all activities at the station
	Daily stock scanning, Stock planning, and Management
	Conduct Security Surveillance and liaise with relevant External and Internal Security Agents to ensure a safe secure operating environment
	Develop cordial and productive relationships with relevant Statutory Agencies and regulatory Bodies
	Establish & Achieve station profitability/Sales goals
	Aggressive Marketing of prospective customers
	Daily/Weekly/monthly/quarterly sales & inventory reports 
	Increase market share through regular sales efforts.
